3: What are you trying to express with these Graffiti?
...to explain... their... work...? What an... amateur... hehe...
It's useless... for you to... try to... find meaning... on this Earth...
Because... humans have failed... Earth... no longer... belongs to humans... You all just... can't accept it...
A new... age of... machines... is already... in its gears... on Earth...
Saying that all machines will be enslaved by the Punishing Virus? Dream on... This is going to be a waste of time.
I... am... a free... machine... free will... I have been... enlightened... by the... Sagemachina...
The Sage... has envisioned... the machine will... the only will in the future...
But... I have... seen... the traces... of its... philosophy...
You all... are just a few... inconsequential... pebbles... in the path...
Do... not... invade... our new world... anymore...
